scripts.browserify: browserify lib/browser.js -s AEL --debug -p [ tinyify --no-flat ]  | exorcist lib/browser.js.map | sponge lib/browser.js
scripts.postbuild: rimraf lib/browser.* && shx cp lib/index.js lib/browser.js && yarn browserify
scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint adaptive-expressions --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\adaptive-expressions .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - Expression" --readme none
scripts.antlr-build-expression: antlr4ts src/parser/ExpressionAntlrLexer.g4 -o src/parser/generated && antlr4ts src/parser/ExpressionAntlrParser.g4 -visitor -o src/parser/generated
